CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( os_Listing_Type__c , 'Sale'), TEXT( os_gsir_Listing_Category__c ) = 'Primary - New Build', TEXT( os_gsir_Mandate__c ) = 'Exclusive' ), 'New Developments - Exclusive Project', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(os_Listing_Type__c , 'Sale'), TEXT(os_gsir_Listing_Category__c ) = 'Primary - New Build', TEXT(os_gsir_Mandate__c ) = 'Non Exclusive' ), 'Offplan Primary', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(os_Listing_Type__c , 'Sale'), TEXT(os_gsir_Listing_Category__c ) = 'Secondary - Second Hand', TEXT( os_uaefields_Completion_Status__c ) = 'Completed' ), 'Ready Property', IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(os_Listing_Type__c , 'Sale'), TEXT(os_gsir_Listing_Category__c ) = 'Secondary - Second Hand', TEXT(os_uaefields_Completion_Status__c ) = 'Off Plan' ), 'Offplan Secondary',
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(os_Listing_Type__c , 'Sale'), TEXT(os_gsir_Listing_Category__c ) = 'Primary - Developers stock', TEXT(os_gsir_Mandate__c ) = 'Non Exclusive' ), 'Offplan Primary',
IF( ISPICKVAL(os_Listing_Type__c , 'Rent'), 'Ready property', '' ) ) ) ) )
)
CustomField.label: Transaction Type
